response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $900,000. I believe this offer presents an exceptional balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and the value it would bring to you. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how we can make this transaction mutually beneficial. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 900000}
